questions.question: You will not succeed …………………………. you work really hard.
I have worked in this office ………………………… twenty years.
She accused me ……………………………… poisoning her cat.
He left ten minutes …………………………..
questions.description: Ago is used to count back from the present.

questions.question: …………………………. you follow your doctor’s advice, you will get well soon.
Martha along with her friends ……………………………. arrived.
questions.description: When two nouns are connected with and, the verb agrees with the former.

questions.question: What …………………………. you do then?
questions.description: The word then shows distance in time. Hence, a past tense is used here.

questions.question: The boy has been missing …………………….. Monday.
questions.description: Use since with the starting point.

questions.question: It ………………………. a hot day, I didn’t go out.
One of the hens ……………………………… missing.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after one of.

questions.question: Neither John nor his wife ………………………… there.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after neither/nor.

questions.question: He is collecting money for …………………………..
questions.description: The homeless means all homeless people.
